results.title: A joint resolution condemning the deadly attack on May 26, 2017, in Portland, Oregon, expressing deepest condolences to the families and friends of the victims, and supporting efforts to overcome hatred, bigotry, and violence.
results.short_title: A joint resolution condemning the deadly attack on May 26, 2017, in Portland, Oregon, expressing deepest condolences to the families and friends of the victims, and supporting efforts to overcome hatred, bigotry, and violence.
results.committees: House Oversight and Government Reform Committee
results.latest_major_action: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

actions.description: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

Introduced in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S3372-3373; text as passed Senate: CR S3372-3373)
